title: Projects of the month
text:
Every month we like to feature a project or two, this month it’s:

  • Balena-Sense - An example multicontainer application using InfluxDB and Grafana to report data recorded by sensors on the Raspberry Pi Sense-HAT we gave to our hackathon attendees.
  • Balena-WPE - A build of WPE Webkit for the Raspberry Pi

Feel free to give them a try and let us know how you get on in the forums.

title: Write about your balena projects, get swag!
text: If you’ve built a project using any of our products, we’d love to hear about it! Write up what you’ve done on a site or in a blog post, then tweet us @balena_io with the #balenablog4swag hashtag and you could get a swag pack and hardware.
